doc.title: A5 Kagoshima Wagyu Tasting Session at Astons Prime
doc.text: Many/JJ thanks/NNS to/TO everyone/VB who/WP turned/VBD up/RP for/IN the/DT A5/NNP Wagyu/NNP session/NN !/. This/DT time/NN round/NN we/PRP had/VBD a/DT 100/CD %/: turnout/NNP which/WDT is/VBZ excellent/JJ !/. I/PRP think/VB it/PRP is/VBZ fair/JJ to/TO say/VB that/IN everyone/PRP felt/VBD that/IN the/DT beef/NN was/VBD great/JJ value/NN ./. Some/DT beefeaters/NN on/IN the/DT other/JJ hand/NN felt/VBD that/IN 200g/NN was/VBD too/RB small/JJ and/CC wanted/VBD a/DT 400g/NN steak/NN instead/RB !/. Many/JJ said/JJ that/IN the/DT beef/NN was/VBD a/DT slice/NN of/IN heaven/NN ,/, but/CC a/DT few/JJ said/JJ that/IN they/PRP had/VBD expected/VBN it/PRP to/TO be/VB more/JJR heavenly/NNS ./.
